place_of_publication.publication_title: Mem. Coll. Sci. Kyoto Imp. Univ., Ser. B, Biol.

TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 少花大披针薹草 shao hua da pi zhen tai cao

treatment.description: Culms shorter than 10–35 cm tall. Female spikes only loosely 2- or 3-flowered; rachis distinctly flexuose. Fl. and fr. May–Jun.
treatment.distribution: On rocks of mountain slopes near forests. Jilin, Nei Mongol [Japan, Russia (Far East, E Siberia)].
